# Ignore node_modules (if you use npm for dependencies)
node_modules/

# Ignore build output or distribution folders
dist/
build/

# Ignore dependency lock files (if not needed in repo)
package-lock.json
yarn.lock

# Ignore editor-specific files
.vscode/
.idea/

# Ignore OS-generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Ignore temporary files
*.tmp
*.log

# Ignore environment files (sensitive data)
.env
.env.local
.env.development.local
.env.test.local
.env.production.local

# Ignore browser cache or compiled files
*.cache
*.min.js
*.min.css
